噣字的基本解释

噣
zhòu
（鸟）嘴：星名，柳宿的别称，传说中的东方朱雀七宿之一。

噣
zhuó
古同“啄”。

噣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhòu］
［《廣韻》陟救切，去宥，知。］
［《廣韻》都豆切，去候，端。］
(1)鸟嘴。
(2)说话。
(3)星宿名。柳宿的别称。
$2［zhuó］
［《廣韻》竹角切，入覺，知。］
同“啄1”。
鸟啄食。
[③]［zhú］
［《廣韻》之欲切，入燭，章。］
鸟名。
[④]［dú］
［《集韻》徒谷切，入屋，定。］
毕星的别名。

噣字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　噣； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页209第29
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?陟救切，音晝。【說文】喙也。【廣韻】鳥口。【史記·楚世家】射噣鳥于東海。【註】索隱曰：噣音晝，謂大鳥之有鉤喙者，以比齊也。【玉篇】引《詩》不濡其噣。亦作咮。○按今《詩》曹風作咮。【集韻】或作注。　又星名。【詩·召南·小星傳】三心五噣。【釋文】噣，張救反。又都豆反。爾雅云，噣謂之柳。○按今《爾雅·釋天》本作咮。　又【廣韻】都豆切【集韻】丁?切，?音?。義同。【廣韻】或作咮。【集韻】或作喙注。　又【廣韻】之欲切【集韻】朱欲切，?音燭。【廣韻】噣?，鳥名。　又【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?竹角切，音啄。【廣韻】鳥生子能自食也。【爾雅·釋鳥】生噣雛。【註】能自食。【釋文】噣，竹角反。【戰國策】黃雀因是以俯噣白粒。【集韻】本作啄。　又【集韻】徒谷切，音讀。畢星別名。

噣字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
噣字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Puff
zhòu
(Bird) beak: star name, another name for Liu Su, one of the legendary Oriental Suzaku seven places.
Puff
zhuó
Gu Tong "pecks".
Puff
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhòu］
["Guang Yun" Zhi rescue cut, go to you, know. ]
["Guangyun" cuts all beans, waits, and ends. ]
(1) Beak.
(2) Talk.
(3) The name of the stars. Another name for Liusu.
$2［zhuó］
["Guangyun" bamboo corner cuts, enters consciousness, knows. ]
Same as "pecking 1".
The bird pecks.
[③]［zhú］
[The desire to cut in "Guang Yun", into the candle, chapter. ]
The name of the bird.
[④]［dú］
["Jiyun" Tuguqie, enter the house, set. ]
Bi Xing's alias.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　噣; Kangxi strokes: 16; page number: page 209 29
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui]? Zhi save the cut, sound day. [Said the text] Beak also. [Guangyun] Bird's mouth. 【Historical Records·Chu Family】Shooting the phoenix in the East China Sea. [Note] Suo Yin said: The sound of the sound of the day, that the big bird has a hook beak, it is also Qi. [Jade articles] Quoting from "Poems" does not succumb to it. Also for Mi. ○According to today's "Poetry" Cao Feng Zuoqi. [Ji Yun] or make a note.　Also star name. 【Poetry·Zhaonan·Xiaoxing Biography】Three hearts and five fates. 【Explanation】Hey, Zhang saves the enemy. They are all rebellious. Er Yayun, so called the willow. ○According to the current "Erya·Shitian" original work.　[Guangyun] Dudou cut [Jiyun] Ding? Cut, sound?. The same meaning. [Guangyun] Or Zuoqi. 【Ji Yun】or beak note.　[Guangyun] The desire to cut [Jiyun] Zhu desire to cut,? Sound candle. [Guang Yun] Boom?, the name of the bird.　 [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Bamboo corner cut, sound peck. [Guangyun] Birds can feed themselves when they have children. 【Erya·Shiniao】Giving birth to young children. [Note] Can eat on its own. [Explanation] 噣, the bamboo horns are reversed. [Warring States Policy] The oriole is because of the white grains. [Ji Yun] This is a peck.　[Jiyun] Tuguqie, pronunciation. Bi Xing alias.
